articles.title: How CBS News tracked down Ghanaian romance scammers duping Americans into parting with huge sums of money - CBS News
articles.description: Chocolates, flowers and gold mines: A CBS News investigation reveals the lengths scammers go to to romance and rob unsuspecting Americans.
articles.content: In the late 1990s and early 2000s, "Nigerian Prince" emails became infamous — typically involving someone claiming to be royalty and asking for money that they promised would be paid back with a heft… [+13351 chars]

articles.title: WATCH: Harris meets with Ukraine’s Zelenskyy as Russia makes nuclear warning - PBS NewsHour
articles.description: With American support for Ukraine at a partisan crossroads, Vice President Kamala Harris on Thursday slammed suggestions that Kyiv should cede territory for the sake of peace with Moscow as “dangerous and unacceptable.”
